title: UK To Compensate LGBTQ Veterans Sacked By Army
content: Until a 2000 reform, lesbians, gays, bisexuals and transgender people were barred from military service in Britain. Those who were found out were often harassed, abused and sacked, according to a government-commissioned report last year.
summary: Until a 2000 reform, lesbians, gays, bisexuals and transgender people were barred from military service in Britain. Those who were found out were often harassed, abused and sacked, according to a government-commissioned report last year.

title: "Anything Can Happen": Donald Trump On Chances Of War With Iran
content: US President-elect Donald Trump said "anything can happen" when asked about the chances of going to war with Iran during his next term.
summary: US President-elect Donald Trump said "anything can happen" when asked about the chances of going to war with Iran during his next term.

title: Historic Garland Worn By Gandhi-ji At Dandi March Goes Unsold At UK Auction
content: The garland, which was worn by Gandhi during the Salt March, was expected to fetch between GBP 20-30,000 but remains open for bids.
summary: The garland, which was worn by Gandhi during the Salt March, was expected to fetch between GBP 20-30,000 but remains open for bids.

title: Bowel Cancer Is Rising Among Under-50s Worldwide, Study Finds
content: Rates of bowel cancer are rising among younger adults, a new study found that also revealed that rates are rising faster in England than in almost any other country.
summary: Rates of bowel cancer are rising among younger adults, a new study found that also revealed that rates are rising faster in England than in almost any other country.

title: D Gukesh Is Youngest-Ever World Chess Champ, Some Others Who Held The Title
content: But 2023 was an eventful year for Gukesh when he unleashed himself to the world as the youngest player to reach a rating of 2750. The same year, he outperformed Viswanathan Anand as the top-ranked Indian chess player.
summary: But 2023 was an eventful year for Gukesh when he unleashed himself to the world as the youngest player to reach a rating of 2750. The same year, he outperformed Viswanathan Anand as the top-ranked Indian chess player.

title: As India Revisits 'One Nation, One Election', 7 Other Countries Play A Part
content: India aims to move to a system of holding a singular, unified, gargantuan election in which citizens elect both the Central government and respective state (federal) governments.
summary: India aims to move to a system of holding a singular, unified, gargantuan election in which citizens elect both the Central government and respective state (federal) governments.

title: Joe Biden Grants Clemency To Nearly 1,500 Criminals: White House
content: Outgoing President Joe Biden said Thursday he had commuted the sentences of nearly 1,500 criminals and pardoned 39 others convicted of non-violent crimes, in what the White House called the largest single-day act of clemency in US history.
summary: Outgoing President Joe Biden said Thursday he had commuted the sentences of nearly 1,500 criminals and pardoned 39 others convicted of non-violent crimes, in what the White House called the largest single-day act of clemency in US history.

title: UK Woman Who Died After Butt-Lift Op Did Not Give Informed Consent: Probe
content: A British woman who died after a Brazilian butt-lift procedure in Turkey had undergone a "frankly barbaric medical practice" in which she gave no informed consent, a coroner ruled, as per the BBC.
summary: A British woman who died after a Brazilian butt-lift procedure in Turkey had undergone a "frankly barbaric medical practice" in which she gave no informed consent, a coroner ruled, as per the BBC.

title: China Influencer Pokes Woman In Miniskirt With A Stick For Stunt, Detained
content: It was later revealed that the woman had been hired by Meng to pose as a passerby, according to the police.
summary: It was later revealed that the woman had been hired by Meng to pose as a passerby, according to the police.

title: Donald Trump Invites Xi Jinping, Other World Leaders To Inauguration
content: US President-elect Donald Trump has invited Chinese President Xi Jinping and other foreign leaders to his inauguration next month in Washington, a Trump transition spokesperson said on Thursday.
summary: US President-elect Donald Trump has invited Chinese President Xi Jinping and other foreign leaders to his inauguration next month in Washington, a Trump transition spokesperson said on Thursday.

title: Meta Donates $1 Million To Donald Trump's Inaugural Fund
content: Meta Platforms have donated $1 million to U.S. President-elect Donald Trump's inaugural fund, a company spokesperson told Reuters in an emailed response.
summary: Meta Platforms have donated $1 million to U.S. President-elect Donald Trump's inaugural fund, a company spokesperson told Reuters in an emailed response.

title: Time Magazine Names Donald Trump 'Person Of The Year' For Second Time
content: Time Magazine on Thursday named US President-elect Donald Trump its "person of the year," marking the second time he has won the accolade in acknowledgement of the mogul's stunning political comeback.
summary: Time Magazine on Thursday named US President-elect Donald Trump its "person of the year," marking the second time he has won the accolade in acknowledgement of the mogul's stunning political comeback.

title: Mujibur's "Joy Bangla" Ceases To Be National Slogan For Bangladesh
content: "Joy Bangla" or "Victory to Bangla" was the symbol of patriotism and unity especially during the birth of Bangladesh. "Joy Bangla" was more than a political slogan - it was a war cry.
summary: "Joy Bangla" or "Victory to Bangla" was the symbol of patriotism and unity especially during the birth of Bangladesh. "Joy Bangla" was more than a political slogan - it was a war cry.

title: This Country Has Scrapped Its Beauty Pageant: "Times Have Changed"
content: The Miss Netherlands beauty pageant is being scrapped after 35 years, organisers said on Thursday, transforming into a new platform dealing with mental health and sharing positive stories.
summary: The Miss Netherlands beauty pageant is being scrapped after 35 years, organisers said on Thursday, transforming into a new platform dealing with mental health and sharing positive stories.

title: Video: Woman In Sri Lanka Falls From Moving Train While Posing For Selfie
content: A video going viral on social media has captured a terrifying moment a tourist fell from a train after being hit by a tree while dangling out of the carriage for a snap.
summary: A video going viral on social media has captured a terrifying moment a tourist fell from a train after being hit by a tree while dangling out of the carriage for a snap.

title: 2025 'Likely' To Be Among Top Three Warmest Years: UK Met Office
content: The UK weather service forecast Thursday that 2025 would likely be among the top three warmest years globally, falling just behind the record-breaking temperatures set in the past months.
summary: The UK weather service forecast Thursday that 2025 would likely be among the top three warmest years globally, falling just behind the record-breaking temperatures set in the past months.

title: Former Pakistan PM Imran Khan, Wife Indicted In Another Graft Case
content: A Pakistani court indicted imprisoned former prime minister Imran Khan and his wife on fresh charges of illegally selling state gifts on Thursday, local broadcaster Geo reported.
summary: A Pakistani court indicted imprisoned former prime minister Imran Khan and his wife on fresh charges of illegally selling state gifts on Thursday, local broadcaster Geo reported.

title: "Insufficient Evidence": Sweden Ends Rape Investigation Against Kylian Mbappe
content: An investigation into alleged rape and sexual assault in Stockholm which targeted Real Madrid forward Kylian Mbappe has been closed due to insufficient evidence, the Swedish prosecutor said.
summary: An investigation into alleged rape and sexual assault in Stockholm which targeted Real Madrid forward Kylian Mbappe has been closed due to insufficient evidence, the Swedish prosecutor said.

title: Syrian Whose Selfie With Merkel Went Viral Wants To Stay In Germany
content: Almost a decade ago, a Syrian refugee's selfie with Germany's then chancellor Angela Merkel went viral. Today, Anas Modamani has a job, a German passport and a fiancee and no plans to return to his war-ravaged country.
summary: Almost a decade ago, a Syrian refugee's selfie with Germany's then chancellor Angela Merkel went viral. Today, Anas Modamani has a job, a German passport and a fiancee and no plans to return to his war-ravaged country.

title: TikTok User Helps US Cops Arrest Suspect Who Fatally Shot Woman 3 Years Ago
content: Social media platform TikTok has helped US police solve a case and arrest a suspect who fatally shot a woman three years ago.
summary: Social media platform TikTok has helped US police solve a case and arrest a suspect who fatally shot a woman three years ago.
